thread.title: How a deeper dive by Apple could crush this market
thread.title_full: How a deeper dive by Apple could crush this market - MarketWatch

author: By     MarketWatch
title: How a deeper dive by Apple could crush this market
text:
MARKETWATCH FRONT PAGE Crumbles by commodities and the Colossus of Cupertino have been getting much of the blame for the market slumping in seven of the past 10 sessions. But Mark Mobius has a bullish take on that most-traded commodity, crude oil. See full story.
Why buying a condo for your college kid could be a smart move With appreciation and tax advantages, you could make money on the deal. See full story.
Seattle CEO grapples with consequences of the $70k minimum wage Does more money lead to better employee performance? See full story.
The best (and worst) frequent-flier programs You’ll be surprised when you see which airline is No. 1. See full story.
Famed short seller sees Chinese stocks doubling by end of 2016 Jon Carnes of Eos Funds, who once made a fortune betting against Chinese companies, is now so bullish on China that he is predicting that the Chinese benchmark index will double by the end of 2016. See full story.
MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE China, where driving a Buick and drinking a PBR are signs you’ve made it. See full story.
